REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2543 reute r f BC-AMERICANTURE-<AAIX>-B 03-26 0078

TEXT.TITLE: AMERICANTURE <AAIX> BUYS AMERICAN ADVENTURE
TEXT.BODY: Americanture Inc said it has purchased American Adventure Inc <GOAQC> for cash, the assumption of liabilities and the issuance of American Adventure Inc common and preferred stock to creditors, shareholders and members. The acquisition was pursuant of a Chapter 11 reorganization plan of American Adventure. The company said the transaction involved assets valued at more than 83 mln dlrs. Reuter
